changeSet.author: jhipster
changeSet.createView: SELECT box.id,box.frozen_box_code,box.frozen_box_code_1d, box.project_code,box.project_name, box.equipment_code,box.area_code,box.support_rack_code as shelves_code,box.columns_in_shelf,box.rows_in_shelf, (box.equipment_code||'.'||box.area_code||'.'||box.support_rack_code||'.'||box.columns_in_shelf||lpad(box.rows_in_shelf,2,0)) as position, box.sample_type_id, s.sample_type_name as sample_type, box.sample_classification_id, sc.sample_classification_name as sample_classification, boxType.frozen_box_type_name as frozen_box_type, (select count(tube.id) from frozen_tube tube where tube.frozen_box_id = box.id and tube.status !='0000' and tube.frozen_tube_state = box.status ) as count_of_used, (boxType.frozen_box_type_columns*boxType.frozen_box_type_rows-(select count(tube.id) from frozen_tube tube where tube.frozen_box_id = box.id and tube.status !='0000' and tube.frozen_tube_state = box.status)) as count_of_rest, box.status,box.frozen_box_type_id,box.project_id, box.equipment_id,box.area_id,box.support_rack_id as shelves_id,box.memo FROM frozen_box box LEFT JOIN sample_type s ON s.id = box.sample_type_id LEFT JOIN sample_classification sc on box.sample_classification_id = sc.id LEFT JOIN frozen_box_type boxType ON box.frozen_box_type_id = boxType.id
